name: My Commute Is Murder
description:
Dodge traffic to make it to work on time and alive, but don't forget the 500MW laser strapped to your roof to clear some space - it'll come in handy to get rid of wreckage and mindless drivers. Arrive safely (enough) as the sun rises and live to make your pay!

Credits -

Title Font: Lady Radical 2 by Chequered Ink (https://www.dafont.com/lady-radical-2.font)

Regular Font: Pixel FJVerdana by flashjunior (https://www.1001fonts.com/pix-pixelfjverdana12pt-font.html)

All music by CodeManu (https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-music-pack-loopable)

Sounds from Dane's Free 8-Bit Pack (https://www.soundsbydane.com/soundpacks) and 7 Space Sounds by Joth (https://opengameart.org/content/7-space-sounds)

Spriting from Kenney.nl's 1-bit pack (https://opengameart.org/content/1-bit-pack)
